price: Wͻn a wͻfiri N’akyi su frε wͻn no nni ntwitwagyeε ho tumi, na mmom gyesε wͻn a wͻdi Nokorε no ho adanseε no, na wͻnim (sɛ Nyankopɔn yɛ baako ampa).
arabic: وَلَا يَمۡلِكُ ٱلَّذِينَ يَدۡعُونَ مِن دُونِهِ ٱلشَّفَٰعَةَ إِلَّا مَن شَهِدَ بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَهُمۡ يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: walā yamliku alladhīna yadʿūna min dūnihi al-shafāʿata illā man shahida bil-ḥaqi wahum yaʿlamūna
